name: Omen of Trident 2704
description:
When young Mr. Adrian Foster receives an unsettling note from his former tutor, he must use his wits and his guile to solve a strange mystery.

Created in 2 weeks for the 2021 Random Game Jam. The title was selected from 10 randomly allocated game titles. All assets were created by the developer, save for the fonts, which are provided by www.fontenddev.com

I would recommend downloading a standalone versions for full crispy pixels.

Thank you for playing.
